content: Since recently I see some changes to the names of the pages.
perhaps I messed up my templates, so just a quick question if anyone is seeing it

when I open an artifact, I go to the page 

output/StructureDefinition-be-communication-examples.html

then when I click in Examples and then back on Content tab, it tries to take me to the page 

output/be-communication-examples.html

is there anything new on the way the files are named?
If not, then I messed up my templates
oops nevermind, I did mess up my templates.

The templates themselves changed a few months ago - went from following the FHIR core convention of not throwing StructureDefinition on the front of all profiles to putting the resource type at the front of all file names - both for consistency and to avoid collisions.
